reviews.review_msg: Whilst he does know what he'd talking about he simply was not cut out to be a teacher. I've never actually had a bad experience with a prof before and this was my last semester. He's very arrogant and has an extremely condescending attitude towards students. The only thing I can say in his favour is that the midterm and final were fair.

This prof completely sucks. First of all, he does not know how to teach. Second, he does not know how to prepare properly. Third, his assignments are so confusing. Fourth, lecture notes are useless. Please think before you take this prof.
